About

I am a full stack developer who enjoy on building application that can help other people. My main focus is creating things that can simplify other people workflows.

Starting with just a hobby editing templates on Blogger, I slowly teach myself on how to code using PHP , Java, Javascript and now I'm into Python. Nowadays I usually use Laravel and Django as my initial framework to build things.

Get in touch

I'm currently looking for full-time Software Engineering! If you know of any positions available, if you have any questions, or if you just want to say hi, please feel free to email me at: hamzahjamad@gmail.com
